title: If Arthur Wore Glasses In The Real World, How Would He Wear Them - BuzzFeed News
text:
Jun told BuzzFeed News that he was wondering how characters with animal ears deal with headphones when someone tweeted him the photo of Arthur with the headphones. ‚ÄúAt that point, I realized the temples of the glasses weren‚Äôt hanging onto anything, so I just wanted to draw some other takes on it,‚Äù Jun said.
